docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ABOUT 890,000 people are on New York City's welfare rolls, more than half of them children. But the statistic is only part of the picture of city poverty, and the whole is decidedly unclear.

headline.main: In New York City, There Are Many Ways to Be Poor

docs.snippet: LEAD: ABOUT 890,000 people are on New York City's welfare rolls, more than half of them children. But the statistic is only part of the picture of city poverty, and the whole is decidedly unclear.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A growing number of people in the Sun Belt are using the skin cream Retin-A to both prevent and treat an early form of skin cancer, even though studies proving the cream is safe and effective against cancer have not been completed.

headline.main: Skin Cream as Anticancer Agent: Experts Are Cautious About Its Use

docs.snippet: LEAD: A growing number of people in the Sun Belt are using the skin cream Retin-A to both prevent and treat an early form of skin cancer, even though studies proving the cream is safe and effective against cancer have not been completed.
